name: birb
description: A JavaScript wrapper for the Discord API.

scripts.publish-the-awesomeness: tsc && npm run files && node test.js && cd dist/ && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish-release: tsc && npm run files && cd dist/ && npm publish
scripts.files: copyfiles package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json .npmignore LICENSE dist

author: knokbak
